cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)

project(pp_hh_5coup CXX Fortran)

# Flags necessary to ensure complex arithmetic performances on-par with
# Fortran code:
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -Wno-unused-variable -std=c++11 -O3 -fcx-fortran-rules -fcx-limited-range")
set(CMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS "${CMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS} -fno-underscoring -fPIC -O3 -ffixed-line-length-none -ffast-math")
#set(CMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS "${CMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS} -fno-underscoring -fPIC -O -w -fbounds-check")

file(GLOB_RECURSE SOURCES "*.cc" "*.f")

include_directories("include")
include_directories("SubProcesses/P1_Sigma_BSM_gg_hh_gg_hh")

#add_library(me_pp_hh_5coup SHARED ${SOURCES})
add_library(me_pp_hh_5coup STATIC ${SOURCES})
